title: Lagging really bad in game dont know why
body: I have a gaming computer I just build a month ago and haven't had any problems playing league till this week. I have a very fast internet connection and dont know what to do my ping is always around 50. The most annoying thing is when i click to a spot it wont register right away and takes a couple of seconds. PLEASE HELP

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some input delays caused by packet loss, which could be caused by a network issue or even your ISP's routing.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out what's going wrong.  The results should also provide troubleshooting steps for your specific case.   Let me know if you have any questions!
